prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with sharp claws and a fierce demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a robust body and powerful jaws, perfect for battles.
Design a creature with green scales and red accents that roams mountainous areas.
Generate a Pokemon known for its incredible strength and intimidating presence.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of ancient dragons with a unique color scheme.
Show me a Pokemon that loves to battle and has a fierce, competitive nature.
Give me an image of a Pokemon that represents the power of evolution and growth.
